signature.title: SIGNATURE COMBINATION
signature.text: Individually tailored treatment concepts combining technology and regenerative care.
signature.modalText: Individually tailored combinations of the latest technology and regenerative care. 80 minutes · €175 – €190 (depending on active ingredients)
signature.modalDescription:
The Signature Combinations combine Aquafacial with light therapy and selected regenerative active ingredients.

Each treatment is individually tailored to the current skin condition and combines cleansing, activation, and soothing into a holistic treatment concept.

What makes this treatment special
 •   Individual combination of technology and active ingredients
 •   Support of skin regeneration and balance
 •   Visibly refined, balanced skin
signature.modalSuitable:
For clients seeking personalized treatments and sustainable skin health. 

Notes 
 •   Personal skin analysis before each treatment
 •   Active ingredient selection is individual
 •   Dermaplaning optional as an add-on

microneedling.title: MICRONEEDLING
microneedling.text: Targeted skin regeneration at a medical-aesthetic level.
microneedling.modalText: Targeted regeneration at a medical-aesthetic level for visibly renewed skin.  80 minutes · from €140
microneedling.modalDescription:
Microneedling specifically stimulates skin renewal and supports natural regeneration.

Through controlled micro-impulses, selected active ingredients are effectively introduced to sustainably support skin texture, evenness, and firmness.

Variants
 •   Cica Aqua EXO – Soothing & hydrating
 •   Salmon DNA – Regenerating & balancing
 •   PDX Exosomes Premium – Intensively regenerating

What makes this treatment special
 •   Precise application at a medical-aesthetic level
 •   Promotion of skin renewal
 •   Improvement of skin appearance and texture
microneedling.modalSuitable:
For demanding, tired, or stressed skin types in need of targeted regeneration.

Notes
 •   Short redness possible
 •   Treatment interval is individual
 •   Sunscreen recommended

aquafacial.title: AQUAFACIAL
aquafacial.text: Deep cleansing and intensive hydration for a clear, balanced complexion.
aquafacial.modalText:
Deep cleansing and intensive hydration at a medical-aesthetic level. 
90 minutes · €175
aquafacial.modalDescription:
Aquafacial is a multi-step facial treatment for thorough cleansing, gentle exfoliation, and intensive hydration. The skin is deeply clarified, soothed, and visibly balanced. At the same time, the natural skin barrier is supported to promote a fresh, even complexion.

The treatment includes cleansing, peeling, extraction, hydration, and protection – for an immediate feeling of freshness and a visibly clear complexion.

What makes this treatment special
 •   Deep cleansing without unnecessary irritation
 •   Intensive moisture supply
 •   Immediately visible balanced complexion
aquafacial.modalSuitable:
For all skin types – ideal for dull, impure, or dehydrated skin. Ideal as a preparation for further treatments.

Notes
 •   No downtime
 •   Perfect as regular care
 •   Can be combined with other treatments

ultimate.title: THE ULTIMATE RITUAL
ultimate.text: Holistic premium ritual for regeneration, skin strengthening, and deep relaxation.
ultimate.modalText:
The holistic premium ritual for maximum regeneration, skin strengthening, and relaxation.
90 minutes · €195 – €235
ultimate.modalDescription:
The Ultimate Ritual combines Microneedling, Aquafacial, and light therapy into an exclusive, holistic treatment concept.

Developed for intensive skin regeneration, targeted barrier strengthening, and deep relaxation – for visibly strengthened, balanced skin.

Variants
 •   Ultimate Cica Aqua EXO
 •   Ultimate Salmon DNA
 •   Ultimate PDX Exosomes

The choice of variant is made individually based on skin analysis.

What makes this treatment special
 •   Holistic approach at the highest level
 •   Precise combination of technology and regenerative care
 •   Intensive skin strengthening with sustainable results
ultimate.modalSuitable:
For demanding skin with increased regeneration needs or as an intensive premium ritual.

Rest time after the treatment is recommended to support the result.

Notes
 •   Individual adjustment of the treatment
 •   Personal skin analysis in advance
 •   Rest time after the treatment is recommended

about.title: ABOUT TÂBTIQUE
about.para1: Conscious skincare. Precise treatments. Time for regeneration.
about.para2: I am the founder of TÂBTIQUE and work as a freelance beautician with a focus on Korean-inspired facial treatments at a medical-aesthetic level.
about.para3: My work is based on professional training in Korean-inspired Aquafacial treatments, microneedling, and individually combined treatment concepts. I combine this knowledge with a responsible approach to modern technology, carefully selected active ingredients, and a clear understanding of skin health.
about.para4: Each treatment is personally performed by me and individually tailored to the current skin condition. My approach is precise, consciously structured, and free from unnecessary overcare – with the goal of sustainably strengthening, balancing, and regenerating the skin.
about.para5: At TÂBTIQUE, quality is prioritized over quantity: personal care, transparency, and a calm, protected space where skin can relax. Each treatment follows a clear concept and is oriented towards the actual needs of the skin.
about.para6: TÂBTIQUE is consciously designed as a boutique studio – for clients who value trust, clarity, and high-quality, individually tailored skin treatments.
